column1: Kata Robata////The food was solidly decent
column3: despite the lackluster service.  The sashimi we ordered was pretty good
column4: as well as the nigiri pieces.  My guest ordered two rolls afterwards and enjoyed both of them
column5: while I ordered a bit more nigiri.  Things were looking up
column7: until dessert arrived.  We ordered the creme brulee and it came out unset.  No creme at all
column8: mainly a liquid mush.  Our server actually had the gall to tell me that "that's the way we make it here."  If that's the way that Kata Robata makes their creme brulee
column9: count me out.  No one should ever eat that pile of trash for dessert.  We didn't even take a spoonful of it out
column11: we were definitely charged for the dessert.
